table.name: vtiger_workflows
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_workflows` ( `workflowsid` int(11) default NULL, `workflowsname` varchar(100) default NULL, `iscontract` int(1) default 0, `iscontent` int(1) default 0, `isattachment` int(1) default 0, `ischargeback` int(1) default 0 ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_workflowscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_workflowscf` ( `workflowsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`workflowsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
